content: I've reviewed #14258 and #14171, which are both straightforward dualizations of existing API in the category theory library, and should be ready to merge

The next one in the Kan extension refactor is ready to go: #14261

(I hope it's ok to use this channel to notify maintainers about PRs that I've reviewed and think are ready to merge, I just don't want them to go unnoticed for long after the review)
Thanks a lot for the review! And yes, posting comments like this is very welcome and encouraged!
There's only one risk, and that's that at one point you might be roped into becoming a reviewer :)
Nothing wrong with that :smiley:
